issue.title: itainews.com

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
# Sorry. The website is infected by AdShield, Inc.

Unfortunately, It is complicated to resolve with a regular adblock rule because the website is being protected by service of Ad-Shield that is an anti-adblock professional company.
Ad-Shield receives up to 700 000 000 KRW per 2 year from tech foundation support program of South Korean government.

These records can be verified at [here](https://github.com/List-KR/List-KR/issues?q=label%3Aad-shield+).
You can check the fact that support of South Korean government at [here](https://www.venturesquare.net/857777).

## Userscript Installation
Please block Ad-Shield advertisement by installing [microShield userscript](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield).
Please check its installation guideline written in English by visiting [this URL](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield/blob/main/README.md).


## Still Have a Problem?
An issue is occurred when the userscript is applied, please report to [this issue tracker](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield/issues).
Please report to [here](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/166924) if other issue.

comment.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://itainews.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fitainews.com%2F) ### Comment > スクリーンショットの黒丸の箇所の広告があった箇所が広告非表示になった後も残っている状態です。 > AdGuard 無料版だとこのような状態になるのは知っているのですが、利用しているのはAdGuard 有料版です。 > AdGuard 有料版は、AdGuard 無料版の設定→ライセンス→マイアカウントにログインしてる状態で画面にはAdGuardのアプリの画面にはAdGuard Premiumと表示されてる状態で利用し、高度な保護機能をオンにしています。 > カスタムフィルタ、ユーザールールは全て無効化し、AdGuardにデフォルトで入ってるフィルタのみにし、フィルタも最新の状態、拡張機能もAdGuard以外全て無効化してもスクリーンショットのような状態になります。 > また該当ウェブサイトだけではなく、livedoorを利用した複数のまとめサイトで発生しており、トップページは発生しないがブログ記事内では発生したり、トップページで発生せずブログ記事内で発生を確認した後にトップページに戻るとトップページでも発生したり、トップページでは発生しない場合もあったりなどの状態です。 > 少なくともウェブサイトのブログ記事内では必ず症状が発生します。 Username: `@なめこ` ### Screenshots

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.google.com/search?q=translator&ie=UTF-8](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.google.com%2Fsearch%3Fq%3Dtranslator%26ie%3DUTF-8) ### Comment > If I turn off AdGuard, the translator works fine. If you turn on AdGuard, not only this button but also the translation function will not work. Not only the translator but also the stock graph 1 year 5 year maximum period buttons that can be used in Google's main search do not work. When you hit a certain store, the results are displayed on the map. When you click on the store, it should get bigger and show more detailed information, but that doesn't work either. > > For some reason, many of the features available in the main Google search do not work. issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=de.spiegel.android.app.spon&hl=de](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fplay.google.com%2Fstore%2Fapps%2Fdetails%3Fid%3Dde.spiegel.android.app.spon%26hl%3Dde) ### Comment > Although adguard filtered properly in the past, for two days now ads (probably coming from outbrain, see below) are not filtered anymore in the "Spiegel" app. Besides the ads I have also noticed a logo near the bottom of displayed pages saying "smartfeed" with the typical blue triangel from outbrain, so I guess the problem is caused by ads coming from outbrain. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/g4efkxk9ne0o0o0kcwcg00g4gc8s0cs97iopxe3fzg.jpg?nc=1)

Send Do-Not-Track header,
Hide your Referrer from third-parties,
Hide your User-Agent,
Block trackers DNS filtering: | server: `Automatisches DNS`

comment.body:
```
||macro.adnami.io^
||outbrain.com^$app=de.spiegel.android.app.spon
||googleadservices.com^$important,app=de.spiegel.android.app.spon
||ups.xplosion.de^$app=de.spiegel.android.app.spon
||api.theadex.com^$app=de.spiegel.android.app.spon
@@||benelph.de^$app=de.spiegel.android.app.spon
```

Those rules are fixing it for me. Cannot add ATM due to Windows 24H2 update.

issue.title: Add tracking parameters for `Google` and `bilibili`
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard Content Blocker, Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

TrackParamFilter/sections/specific.txt@ddefaa8

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed analytics or tracker

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Chrome, Microsoft Edge

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

google.com & bilibili.com & youtube.com

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter

### Privacy

AdGuard Tracking Protection filter

### Social Widgets

_No response_

### Annoyances

_No response_

### Security

_No response_

### Other

_No response_

### DNS filters

_No response_

### Language-specific

_No response_

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

<details>
<summary>the problem URL:</summary>

* https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aHUtMbJw8iA **&si=xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx**
* https://www.google.com/search?sca_upv=1&q=transport **&uds=xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx** &ictx=0
* https://www.google.com/search?q=moe&newwindow=1&sca_upv=1 **&iflsig=xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx** &uact=5
* https://www.google.com/search?newwindow=1&sca_upv=1&q=png **&fbs=xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx**
* https://www.google.com/webhp? **sca_esv=xxxxxxxxxxxxxx** &sca_upv=1&output=search&tbm=isch **&ved=xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx**
* https://manga.bilibili.com/? **from=bill_top_mnav**
* https://show.bilibili.com/platform/home.html? **msource=pc_web**
* https://www.bilibili.com/bangumi/play/ss48011? **from_spmid=xxx.x.hotlist.x**
* etc.

</details>

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
> Hi. Need urls with these parameters for test. Removing of some parameters may prevent automatic redirection.

Hi. The `si` in the youtube sharing link has been confirmed to be a tracking parameter. [Also](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/fc92a7d2e802dc8bbda14c560fa112915ed34ef4/TrackParamFilter/sections/specific.txt#L289)
As for Google, I can only find a few information about tracking parameters, such as https://serpapi.com/blog/google-search-parameters/#the-ved-parameter I'm sorry I can't provide more help, but according to my test, it has not affected normal browsing.
bilibili's `from` and `source` are used to track the source of visits, just like [this](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/6b7b4cc90d42f5256af38e0680ee52c62f45cff9/TrackParamFilter/sections/specific.txt#L2017)
The `from_spmid` has the same function as [`spm_id_from` `from_spm_id`](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/6b7b4cc90d42f5256af38e0680ee52c62f45cff9/TrackParamFilter/sections/specific.txt#L2018-L2019)

This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

comment.body:
Nie potrafię odtworzyć tego problemu, gdy mam włączone tylko listy AdGuarda, więc problem najpewniej powoduje jakaś lista trzecia.
Prawdopodobnie `EasyList Cookie List`, spróbuj proszę dodać tę regułę:
```adblock
@@||cmp.inmobi.com^$domain=wpolityce.pl
```
do reguł użytkownika, a potem sprawdź proszę czy problem nadal występuje.

Jeśli to nie rozwiąże problemu, to spróbuj wyłączyć po kolei wszystkie listy trzecie:
```
EasyList Cookie List
Adblock Warning Removal List
Official Polish filters for AdBlock, uBlock Origin & AdGuard
KAD - Anti-Scam
Polish Annoyances Filters
Polish Anti Adblock Filters
EasyList Polish
```
i sprawdź proszę, która lista powoduje ten problem.

Известно, что эта проблема решается с помощью AdGuard Extra.

Если вы пользуетесь AdGuard на устройствах Windows, Mac или Android, пожалуйста, убедитесь, что AdGuard Extra включена в настройках приложения.

Если вы используете расширение AdGuard для браузера, рекомендуется также установить AdGuard Extra.

issue.title: itainews.com

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
# Sorry. The website is infected by AdShield, Inc.

Unfortunately, It is complicated to resolve with a regular adblock rule because the website is being protected by service of Ad-Shield that is an anti-adblock professional company.
Ad-Shield receives up to 700 000 000 KRW per 2 year from tech foundation support program of South Korean government.

These records can be verified at [here](https://github.com/List-KR/List-KR/issues?q=label%3Aad-shield+).
You can check the fact that support of South Korean government at [here](https://www.venturesquare.net/857777).

## Userscript Installation
Please block Ad-Shield advertisement by installing [microShield userscript](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield).
Please check its installation guideline written in English by visiting [this URL](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield/blob/main/README.md).


## Still Have a Problem?
An issue is occurred when the userscript is applied, please report to [this issue tracker](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield/issues).
Please report to [here](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/166924) if other issue.

comment.body:
U siebie nie potrafię odtworzyć tego problemu z włączoną listą `AdGuard Widgets filter`/`Filtr Widżetów AdGuard`.
Jedynie po włączeniu `EasyList Cookie List` problem się u mnie pojawia, i dodanie:
```adblock
@@||cmp.inmobi.com^$domain=wpolityce.pl
```
do reguł użytkownika rozwiązuje problem.

issue.title: itainews.com

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
# Sorry. The website is infected by AdShield, Inc.

Unfortunately, It is complicated to resolve with a regular adblock rule because the website is being protected by service of Ad-Shield that is an anti-adblock professional company.
Ad-Shield receives up to 700 000 000 KRW per 2 year from tech foundation support program of South Korean government.

These records can be verified at [here](https://github.com/List-KR/List-KR/issues?q=label%3Aad-shield+).
You can check the fact that support of South Korean government at [here](https://www.venturesquare.net/857777).

## Userscript Installation
Please block Ad-Shield advertisement by installing [microShield userscript](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield).
Please check its installation guideline written in English by visiting [this URL](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield/blob/main/README.md).


## Still Have a Problem?
An issue is occurred when the userscript is applied, please report to [this issue tracker](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield/issues).
Please report to [here](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/166924) if other issue.

issue.title: www.youtube.com

labels.name: T: Anti Adblock Script
labels.description: The site detects ad blocking

labels.name: NSFW
labels.description: Nudes and porn sites

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
# ATTENTION

> [!NOTE]  
> YouTube changes their detection scripts regularly. That means that sometime you can face the detection message.
> If all the following instructions do not work, please **email filters@adguard.com** or wait until any update is available. 

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use another adblocker in the same time because using another adblocker can delay/lags the YouTube loading (e.g., AdBlock Plus and AdBlock)[^1] OR interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use an userscript related to the bypassing YouTube detection message like [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing).
> Recently, YouTube anti-adblock script added infinite dummy advertisements to try to neutralize the userscript. ( [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing#264](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing/issues/264) )

> [!WARNING]
> Please check that there no another web browser extension that has adblocking feature is enabled on your web browser. It can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> Saving memory feature of your web browser or sleep feature of your operating system can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.
> In this case, please re-enable AdGuard's filtering by toggling the protection toggle.
> Following the instructions can be needed.

### The instructions
1. Force to update the filters by clicking the reload button in AdGuard Browser Extension/AdGuard mobile or update tray menu in your system tray. [^2]
2. Reload the YouTube webpage without cache by pressing <kbd>Ctrl</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd> [^3].
3. Clear cache, cookies and site data of your web browser.
4. Re-open your web browser completely (checking your system monitor[^4] will be better).

[^1]: https://gitlab.com/adblockinc/ext/adblockplus/adblockplusui/-/issues/1576
[^2]: [AdGuard for Windows](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-windows/overview/#tray-menu); [AdGuard for Mac](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-mac/overview/#updates-check); 
[^3]: On macOS, <kbd>Command</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd>
[^4]: Task Manager on Windows, System Monitor on GNOME Shell, KDE System Guard on KDE Plasma or Activity Monitor on macOS. 


Previous issue https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/184282
